thread.title: Easybook Named the Fastest Online Ticket Booking Platform Option for the modern traveller
thread.title_full: Easybook Named the Fastest Online Ticket Booking Platform Option for the modern traveller

author: prbuzz.com
title: Easybook Named the Fastest Online Ticket Booking Platform Option for the modern traveller
text:
Easybook, the online ticket booking platform has proved to be a fast and modern option for the modern traveller. Now, you can book tickets with a click when you set out to travel by bus from Miri to the Brunei . The irresistible offers with a combo of innumerable travel services that are world class in their services.
Founded in 2005, Easybook, the most popular online ticketing platform has been easing out the travelling complications of the outdoorsies and tour travellers. Since years, the online ticketing portal has been selling express bus coach tickets, car rentals and train tickets and various other travel services to travellers in Singapore and Malaysia. With more than 100 partnerships with coach companies in Thailand, Malaysia, Singapore and Indonesia, it has been able to resolve ticketing issues of travellers.
Miri has two most popular direct bus services to Brunei. The PHLS bus express offers a dedicated express coach service from the town to Brunei. The bus departs at morning 8:15 am and has been associated with Easybook since long. Easybook also has a proud association with Bintang Jaya Express that has been providing daily bus services from Miri to Brunei. The partnership of Easybook with the express bus coach services has enabled the largest online booking portal in providing the best to its customers.
Easybook with its ease of use and versatility has proved to be quite a relief to the frequent travellers. You can avail a number of additional services at a much cheaper price when you book your tickets with Easybook.
Get more details on coach schedules and booking information from the website www.easybook.com .
